action_details: Based on the high estimated incident severity and 3 injured people, we will allocate 2 doctors for immediate triage and treatment at the scene. Additionally, considering the nearby hospital's capacity for accommodating incident victims, we will send 6 more doctors to assist with receiving and stabilizing the patients upon arrival. The team should also include a trauma specialist or an emergency medicine physician to oversee the response. Upon arrival at the scene, perform a quick assessment of the situation to determine if any further medical assistance is required from nearby units.
